data.name: Sunset Mall
data.detailed_description:
Reviews

"It's pretty fun and something you can pick up easily. It has high replay value with the included challenges." - Vapor Games

"Armed with a shopping list, make your way through a brightly-lit mall and pick up what you need." - WF Games


Feature List

Sunset Mall Features tons of different things, but here is a few:

  • A Procedurally generated Mall to explore.
  • A Soft and Aesthetic style.
  • An adaptive world with changing seasons, holiday events and more!
  • A Vaporwave soundtrack that will keep you shopping for hours!
  • Challenges and Achievements guaranteed to keep you entertained.
  • Lot's of speedrunning capability!
  • Tons of random quotes, references and Easter Eggs from entirely unique shoppers!
  • Nostalgic UI that makes you feel as though your booting up your old 90's PC once more...


Discord Integration



Discord is beautiful for many reasons but here are a few:

  • Join the Sunset Mall Discord server for insider information and to give suggestions.

  • Interact with the Sunset Mall - Quotes bot where you can see quotes from inside the game as well as request your own...

  • Check your game stats from within Discord via the Sunset Mall - Stats bot!

  • See your Discord friends in game in all their glory!

  • Be part of a fun Vaporwave Community

  • And much much more!


Vaporwave Style



Reminisce over a past you may not have even experienced yourself as you listen to smooth 80s and 90s jazz while making your way across a mall full of old movies, games, toys and more.

Lose yourself in the Mall, just not too much...


Multiplayer



While Multiplayer is still in Closed Beta, you can still log in and set up your profile and customise your character.

Multiplayer Features:

  • Join friend's in a Random Mall where you can work together or compete for the number 1 spot

  • Have up to 8 players in one Mall (Can Change).

  • Complete Daily challenges for rewards

  • Earn your way up with levels and ranks, show off your status with custom clothing, icons, vehicles and much much more!

  • And much much more to come after Multiplayer is bug free and operational!


About the Game



Sunset Mall is a simple "Vaporwave" style adventure game situated in a 90's Shopping Mall where you explore a randomly generated mall in search of iconic 80's - 90's Music, Movies, Toys, Consoles and Games all while you enjoy the aesthetic style and music.

There are 100s of hidden references and Easter Eggs in the game, a lot of which may never be found.

Things to do in Sunset Mall:
  • Visit a variety of stores that are constantly moving, upgrading and changing as time goes on.
  • Talk to unique shoppers that have their own name, look, style and attitude!
  • Run, hide or fight back against muggers, don't let them take your hard earned cash!
  • Visit an ATM and withdraw some cash to help with your shopping trip, don't worry about the banks asking for it back. surely they wont mind, right?
  • Listen to Smooth Vaporwave music spanning over multiple soundtracks!
  • Visit a vending machine and try the bubbly taste of the ALL-NEW Sunset Cola, or spray it at people... if you are mean like that.

The History of Sunset Mall
The game originally released on Itch.io as a reference to Mall Quest which was removed by its developer for unknown reasons.
After a great reception, Sunset Mall was completely rewritten and revamped to provide a better, more fun and performant experience and now here it is on Steam!

Credits:
Thanks to Byzantium for the original game concept : )
Thanks to Chalet Magical for their great music tracks!
And a thanks to everyone who reviews this game, honest feedback is the only way a game can improve and I really appreciate it!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: x86 and x64 Compatible.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS High Sierra or newer
  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640 or newer
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: x86 and x64 Compatible.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or newer
  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640 or newer
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: x86 and x64 Compatible.
